metadata.synopsis: The Fire Wizard interrupts the combat to shout crazy profanities at you. You can take the opportunity to convince him to stop fighting, or you can continue to fight.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ago to -303; 24; 116start going up the path, fighting through the elmentalsonce you are spotted by the wizard, he will start the dialog

10.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
10.text: Sarin is... silent, now. I think. At rest.

19.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
19.text: What's this, Cousin? Another Absolutist come to see what we did to poor old Sarin?

39.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
39.text: Your god took her mind, cultist. So Bareki took her head, and I burned the flesh from her bones.

4.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
4.text: And now you come to interrupt the funeral rites? I -

29.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
29.text: Cousin says we will take you in return. He says you look just like kindling for Sarin's funeral pyre.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: You have it wrong. I'm not with the Absolute!

17.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
17.text: Hah. I believe you may believe that. The Absolute takes people, twists them...

12.speaker: Player
12.text: And 'Cousin' looks like he fell out of an aboleth's arse. Are you sure you're related?

36.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
36.text: He is... clan. Summoned in place of the friends that I lost.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: I haven't got the slightest idea who or what you're talking about.

22.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
22.text: Of course you don't. Sarin, Bareki, and I made our coin by going unnoticed. The finest thieves in the city - until we messed with Gortash and he sent the cult after us.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Wait. No need for violence. Just tell me what happened to your friend.

62.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
62.text: I took my friend's life - but only after your god took her soul.

5.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
5.text: Sarin, Bareki, and I - we were the three finest thieves in Baldur's Gate. We broke into the offices of Gortash. Discovered he was with the Absolute too.

44.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
44.text: Your fellow cultists hunted us so we hid down here. We were safe - and so was our loot - until the darkness soured Sarin's mind. She kept our treasure from us, said Bareki and I had gone strange.

61.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
61.text: HUSH, COUSIN! Sarin turned into a cultist herself. So we did what we had to. Bareki wept until his voice was gone - and then he was gone, too.

31.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
31.text: Leaving only me to conduct Sarin's rites. And my cousins, here - you cannot conduct the rites without a clan to bear witness. Or some fuel for the fire.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: My people know this rite - Ixinloex, the 'Burning of the Dead'. There can be no bloodshed here.

16.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
16.text: ...You're right. It must be a cleansing fire. A pure one. I took Sarin's life - I must be sure she does not lose her soul, as well.

15.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
15.text: Pass, then - and do NOT come BACK. This is Sarin's final resting place - and a killing ground for all who come to disturb her.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Your paranoia already killed Sarin. Are you so keen to follow her?

52.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
52.text: I... cannot. I am the last of us left to do the rites. I must do the rites.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: I'm not a cultist. And I don't think your friend was, either. Your paranoia turned you against one another.

25.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
25.text: She swore she was no cultist, but you all lie - the Absolute turns you...

60.speaker: Player
60.text: If you're a thief, then you answer to Nine-Fingers. We're allies.

57.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
57.text: You serve the guildmaster...? Then you cannot be with the cult. Or... perhaps she is.

0.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
0.text: I don't know. I don't know! Pass, then - and do NOT come BACK. This is Sarin's final resting place - and a killing ground for all who come to disturb her.

63.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
63.text: NO NO NO! You are so deep in the Absolute's power, you do not even know it yourself. Just like Sarin!

27.speaker: Player
27.text: You need witnesses - I'm a witness. Just here to pay my respects.

14.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
14.text: ...Good. That is good. She deserves... more than me.

1.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
1.text: Pay your respects as you pass, then - and do NOT come BACK.

59.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
59.text: This is Sarin's final resting place - and a killing ground for all who come to disturb her.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: I'm sworn to a better god than the Absolute. Why not let me say a prayer?

46.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
46.text: Say your words as you pass, then, priest. And do NOT come BACK.

2.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
2.text: NO! Enough of the gods and their meddling - she will be PURE!

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Go on, then. Let's find out whose flame is bigger.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Mephits and grease. Press me, and you might see some real magic.

21.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
21.text: Perhaps Bareki will find me again. His jokes were much better than Cousin's.
